title: Follow live: Knicks off to rocky start in Game 2 vs. Celtics
Curry to miss at least a week as Warriors 'adapt'
description: Warriors star Stephen Curry will miss at least one week of the playoffs after he was diagnosed with a Grade 1 left hamstring strain.
author: Ohm Youngmisuk

title: 'Clock ticking on Arteta to prove he can be a winner'
description: The clock is ticking for Arsenal and manager Mikel Arteta to show they can be winners after Champions League exit to PSG, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: Itoje set to be named British and Irish Lions captain
description: Maro Itoje is set to be confirmed on Thursday as the British and Irish Lions captain for the tour of Australia.

title: Itoje set to be named Lions skipper
description: Maro Itoje is set to be named as the first English captain of the British and Irish Lions since 2001 when the squad is announced on Thursday.

title: Real Madrid want Alexander-Arnold early to play in Club World Cup
description: Real Madrid have approached Liverpool about signing Trent Alexander-Arnold early so he can play in the Club World Cup in June.

title: Mavericks fire top training staff after injury-plagued season, reported internal fights
description: Good news, Mavericks fans. Nico Harrison has found the problem.
author: Jack Baer
